explanation: lfs_tortoise_detectcycles only calls lfs_pair_issync. To determine whether lfs_tortoise_detectcycles could call itself (directly or indirectly) you must inspect lfs_pair_issync and any symbols it calls; if lfs_pair_issync (or any transitive callee) calls back into lfs_tortoise_detectcycles (or into a chain that reaches it) that would create indirect recursion and violate the MISRA rule. The provided static call graph shows lfs_pair_issync has no callees, so inspecting lfs_pair_issync is sufficient.
